name: Take A Ride
content: And we can roll roll roll roll
And we can go go go go
Go back to the hood with you
My hands goin' up your thigh
I'm harder than a Scud missile
My crib or to the hotel
This ray is smokin' so well
Hair down wit' your pearl nails
And we can roll roll roll roll
And we can go go go go
No need to take your clothes off
Tell him how the pound went
Just let me roll this green up
Park it then I steam up
I swear she caught a fever
Said she wasn't a freak but
She was down to try things
Down is where her face went
And we can roll roll roll roll
And we can go go go go
